feedback: Strong scaffold. All 8 checklist items present. Tauri v2 + React 19 + TS strict, Vite configured correctly, ESLint strictTypeChecked, shadcn/ui config present, all runtime packages installed, git2 vendored, SQLite 4 tables with FK/indexes, vitest 3/3. Code quality excellent: no any types, no classes, files under 300 lines. Minor gaps: no shadcn/ui component files installed yet, no App smoke test, placeholder favicon.
recommendations: Install shadcn/ui component primitives (Button, Dialog, etc.) for Phase 2 readiness
Add :root defaults for HSL CSS variables as fallback
Add TODO comments to scaffold placeholders per CLAUDE.md convention
